sentences: .. ja kuigi mamma Neider kui kristlik naisterahvas oli iga tühise uhkuse ja alpuse vastu ..
context: The word 'tehke' is the plural imperative form of the Estonian verb 'töötama' (to work/do). In this context, it's used as a negative command instructing people to avoid or refrain from doing something. The sentence structure shows it being used in an instructional or prohibitive sense.
